price: Reci: “Ja ne znam da li će uskoro biti ono čime vam se prijeti ili je Gospodar moj odredio da će to poslije dugo vremena biti.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul in adrī aqarībun mā tūʿadūna am yajʿalu lahu rabbī amadan
